title: Bug 10593: Jar export should add ".jar" suffix if not specified
OB: When selecting some files in build 20020228 and exporting them using the jar export feature, if the user enters "test" as the jar name, it creates a jar file called "test" instead of "test.jar".
EB: The export feature should automatically add the ".jar" suffix to the jar name if it is not specified by the user.
SR:
To reproduce, follow these steps:
1. Select some files in build 20020228.
2. Go to the jar export feature.
3. Enter a jar name without the ".jar" suffix.
4. Complete the export process.
5. Verify that the jar file is created with the ".jar" suffix added.
